After performing the hand seal, a special clock appears on the palm of one's choosing. This clock was developed by [[Konohagakure]], only to be used by the five [[Kage]] and their most trusted assistants. It serves as a countdown to the Earth's destruction, after [[Toneri]] dislodged the [[Moon]] from its orbit.
